name: Gnometopia
description:
In the peaceful land of Gnometopia everyone has a super power: making it rain, getting the sun to shine, or keeping up good spririts by playing musical instruments. These powers makes the residents of Gnometopia the perfect gardeners. By their mere present they can tend to their plants and make them grow and fourish.

But the little gnomes have to be careful:
          - too much rain and the plants will drown
          - too much sun and the delicate flour burn
          - too much music and the plants go mad

Grab your water hose, sun rays, musical instruments, and two friends and start a (not so relaxing) gardening adventure!

Can't be too hard keeping a few plants alive ... can it?

(Currently has no soundscape. Your speakers are not broken!)
